meaning_str.bing:
adj. 珍奇的；珍稀的；宝贵的；珍贵的
n. 可爱的人；【女名】女子名
adv. 强调极少或太少
网络. 珍爱人生；贵重的；宝贝

珍奇的；珍稀的；宝贵的；珍贵的

贵重的；珍贵的；宝贵的；受珍爱的；心爱的；（表示气愤）宝贝似的；珍稀的；道貌岸然的
珍贵之物；心爱之人；宝贝；珍宝；亲爱的（人）；珍视的东西

1.en: I'll tell you but you must keep it a secret. Oh, they are precious, have no fear about that!
1.cn: 我可以告诉你，但你要保密。哦，这些石头当然很珍贵，别担心这个。

2.en: We hope XX and XX cherish every little bit of your love, for this is one of your precious wealth of your life after marriage.
2.cn: 但愿xx和xx要爱护保重你们相亲相爱的点点滴滴，这是你们此后婚姻糊口的一份珍贵财富。

3.en: It seemed to me, as I kept remembering all this, that those times and those summers had been infinitely precious and worth saving.
3.cn: 对我来说，因为我不断回忆往昔的一切，那些时光那些夏日是无穷宝贵而永远值得怀念的。

0.en: Uncle's most precious, born in the Year of the Monkey. That's why you're so clever, precious and clever.
0.cn: 舅舅最珍贵的小宝贝，猴年出生，所以你才如此聪慧，珍贵且聪慧。

1.en: All the bright, precious things fade so fast. And they don't come back.
1.cn: 华美珍贵的事物总是很快逝去，而且一去不复返。

2.en: The theater is a temple of art. A precious cornucopia of creative energy.
2.cn: 剧场是艺术的殿堂，剧场能孕育出珍贵的创造力。

3.en: Pass me a napkin. Is milady's arm broken? Yours is about to be. Aww, precious flowers.
3.cn: 递我一张纸巾吧。夫人的胳膊断了吗？你的胳膊就要被我打断了。祖国珍贵的花朵。

4.en: To fight back, plants began to evolve a whole arsenal of defences for their precious leaves.
4.cn: 为了反击植物进化出一系列的武器来保卫它们珍贵的叶子。

5.en: Those test subjects, those turtles, running in their blood is the last of this precious mutagen.
5.cn: 这些实验对象，那些乌龟，他们血液里流淌着的就是这种珍贵的突变体。

6.en: All right. What is in the safe? Something for you. Maurice always said it was his most precious gift to you. A will. Maurice's will is with Port and Dunn.
6.cn: 箱内有什么东西？是给你的，令尊说过 那是给你最珍贵的礼物，一份遗嘱。他的遗嘱在律师那里。

7.en: To have a precious few of them back.
7.cn: 宝贵的时光一去不复返啊。

8.cn: 听着，珍贵，麦克不值得你这样。

9.en: Oh please. Every moment is precious. You know?
9.cn: 拜托，每分每秒都很珍贵。

10.en: And my precious souvenir snow globe collection.
10.cn: 还有我全球的雪景水晶球。

11.en: You are so precious, I could just take you home.
11.cn: 瞧你可爱的，真想带你回家。

12.en: Only 8,000? We're wasting precious time. Buy it.
12.cn: 只有八千把？我们在浪费宝贵时间，快买下。

13.en: It is precious to you beyond measure, I understand that.
13.cn: 在你眼中是无价之宝我，能够理解。

14.en: Time is the single most precious commodity in the universe.
14.cn: 因为只有时间在宇宙中才是最为宝贵的资源。

15.en: Why waste precious time dreaming when waking life is so much better?
15.cn: 既然醒时的生活如此美好，为何要把宝贵时间浪费在做梦上呢？

16.en: That is precious. Listen, I need Rachel's flight information. Oh, okay.
16.cn: 可爱死了！！！听着，我要瑞秋的航班信息，哦，好。

17.en: All right. Susie. Can I call you Susie? My name is Precious. I can't say that.
17.cn: 好的，苏希，我能叫你苏希吗？我的名字叫珍贵。我叫不出口。

18.en: You can't have your precious memory falling into the wrong hands, now, can you?
18.cn: 不能让自己的宝贵记忆被敌人窃取，是吗？

19.en: A precious few people know about your true identity. It would be unfortunate if we forgot.
19.cn: 没什么人知道你的真实身份，要是我们不小心忘了就惨了。
